sections.title: OTC - ACTIVE INGREDIENT SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
DRUG FACTS
HPUS Active Ingredients: Silicea 30C, Thuja Occidentalis 12C. The letters HPUS indicate that the components in this product are officially monographed in the Homeopathic Pharmacopoeia of the United States. Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated.
sections.text_plain: DRUG FACTS HPUS Active Ingredients: Silicea 30C, Thuja Occidentalis 12C. The letters HPUS indicate that the components in this product are officially monographed in the Homeopathic Pharmacopoeia of the United States. Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated.

sections.title: INDICATIONS & USAGE SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Indications:</content> Supports the body in coming back to balance after inoculation without removing any benefits.</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Indications: Supports the body in coming back to balance after inoculation without removing any benefits.

sections.title: WARNINGS SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
WARNINGS
FOR ANIMAL USE ONLY. KEEP OUT
OF REACH OF CHILDREN. DO NOT
USE IF TAMPER EVIDENT NECK
SEAL IS BROKEN OR MISSING.
Safe use in pregnant animals or
animals intended for breeding has
not been proven.
If animal’s condition worsens or does
not improve, discontinue use and
consult your veterinarian
sections.text_plain: WARNINGS FOR ANIMAL USE ONLY. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. DO NOT USE IF TAMPER EVIDENT NECK SEAL IS BROKEN OR MISSING. Safe use in pregnant animals or animals intended for breeding has not been proven. If animal’s condition worsens or does not improve, discontinue use and consult your veterinarian

sections.text_plain: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN

sections.title: DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="underline">
                        <content styleCode="bold">Directions:</content>
                     </content> Add 4 pumps to a small amount of food twice per day. Not to be used for more than 10 consecutive days.</paragraph>
                  <paragraph>For more information or options to administer refer to our website.</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Directions: Add 4 pumps to a small amount of food twice per day. Not to be used for more than 10 consecutive days. For more information or options to administer refer to our website.

sections.title: INACTIVE INGREDIENT SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">
                        <content styleCode="underline">Inactive Ingredients:</content>
                     </content> Organic Ethanol 15%, Purified Water, Vegetable Non-GMO Glycerin.</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Inactive Ingredients: Organic Ethanol 15%, Purified Water, Vegetable Non-GMO Glycerin.

sections.title: OTHER SAFETY INFORMATION
sections.text_xhtml:
Safe use in pregnant animals or animals intended for breeding has not been proven.
If animal’s condition worsens or does not improve, discontinue use and consult your veterinarian
sections.text_plain: Safe use in pregnant animals or animals intended for breeding has not been proven. If animal’s condition worsens or does not improve, discontinue use and consult your veterinarian
